ygData.subject: Re: Why are you playing a SK
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Howard Chan  To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com  Date: Friday, June 04, 1999 11:29 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Howard Chan <hchan@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 04, 1999 11:29 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Why are you playing a SK


>From: "Howard Chan" <hchan@...>
>
>Blackened armor can be obtained at Runnyeye

Directions to this place? How much or is loot?


>At level 10, I had full banded
>armor except for the cape and helm. The helm I had was steel plate >and the
>cape was leather. Then I decided that the plate helm looked ugly and sold
it
>to purchase blackened armor (tunic, pants, belt, crown, bracer, sleeves,
>glove). The blackened armor would be the best equipment in terms >of
coolness
>and AC. But when you reach a higher level, you would then be obligated to
>switch back to banded (because the blackened is heavy and the loot >you
start
>getting becomes heavier also) or bronze for the AC.



Where's the best place to buy banded, or get it as loot??


Later
Chris

Remlin Ryal, Warolord of House Ryal
Rallos Zek
